meanings.definition: The office or building in which a consul conducts his or her official duties.
meanings.sent1: The consulates in the city provide assistance to citizens traveling abroad.
meanings.sent2: Foreigners can visit consulates to get help with legal matters in a different country.
meanings.sent3: The consulates were so busy that they started offering virtual appointments to save time.
meanings.sent4: In the bustling city, the consulates stood tall like guardians of international relations.
meanings.sent5: The consulates, with their flags flying high, symbolize diplomatic ties between nations.
